title: Dask Dashboard
description: Settings for the Dask Dashboard plugin.

defaultURL.title: Default URL
defaultURL.description: Default URL for the Dask Dashboard Webserver

autoStartClient.title: Auto-Start Client
autoStartClient.description: If set to true, every notebook and console will automatically have a dask client for the active cluster injected into the kernel under the name 'client'

address.description: The full address of the dask-gateway server.

proxyAddress.description: The full address of the dask-gateway scheduler proxy. If not provided, this defaults to address.
